column1: I AM REALLY ANNOYED BY YOUR CONSTANT COMPLAINING AND YOU NEVER OFFER ANY SOLUTIONS WHICH IS VERY UNHELPFUL AND NEGATIVE
IT IS FRUSTRATIWG THAT YOU NEVER PAY ATTENTION DURING DISCUSSIONS AND YOUR LACK OF FOCUS IS REALLY AFFECTING OUR PROGREOS
I AM DELIAHTED BY DOUR FRIENDLINESS AND YOU ALWAYS MAKE EVERYONE FEEL WELCOME WHICH FOSTERS A SENSE OF COMMUNITY
IT IS WONDERFUL THAT YOU ALWAYS SHOW KINDNESS AND YOUR EMPATHY TOWARDS OTHERS IS TRULY HEARTWARMINT AND APPRECIATED
